name: Xarcuteria Jacobià
desc: Tenim cansalada: la millor. Tenim choriços: no tenen comparació. Tenim vedella: et guardem el millor troç. No et perdis la carn del escorxador de Mataró, un cop la tastis tornaràs a Jacobià.
descENG: We have bacon: the best. We have chorizos: they are incomparable. We have beef: we’ll save the best piece for you. Don't miss the meat from the Mataró slaughterhouse, once you taste it you will return to Jacobià.
